text: ai logon! ek misaal pesh kee jaatee hai. use dhyaan se suno, allaah se hatakar tum jinhen pukaarate ho ve ek makkhee bhee paida nahin kar sakate. yadyapi isake lie ve sab ikatthe ho jaen aur yadi makkhee unase koee cheez chheen le jae to usase ve usako chhuda bhee nahin sakate. bebas aur asahaay raha chaahanevaala bhee (upaasak) aur usaka abheesht (upaasy) bhee
